Opal Dividends.name: Opal Dividends
Opal Dividends.desc: Each opal invested in a villager now gives them 125 EXP/hr, instead of 100 EXP/hr @ Also worry not, you can reset your opals later at Cavern 7

Better Buckets.name: Better Buckets
Better Buckets.desc: Increases the base fill rate of all Well Buckets from 10/hr to 15/hr. IMPORTANT:You can click on the buckets for more info!

Cavern 'Porting.name: Cavern 'Porting
Cavern 'Porting.desc: All teleports to this map are free! Also, did you know you can double-click a map instead of pressing the Teleport button?

2nd Bucket!.name: 2nd Bucket!
2nd Bucket!.desc: Adds another bucket at the Well! You'll need to expand your Gravel bar to hold the 130 needed to create this!

3rd Bucket!.name: 3rd Bucket!
3rd Bucket!.desc: Adds another bucket at the Well! Remember, click a bucket to change what sediment it collects! That's how you get this gold resource!

4th Bucket!.name: 4th Bucket!
4th Bucket!.desc: Adds yet another bucket at the Well!

Five Nights at Bucket.name: Five Nights at Bucket
Five Nights at Bucket.desc: Adds one more bucket at the Well! Five buckets!!! WOW! That's worth writing home about!

6th Bucket!.name: 6th Bucket!
6th Bucket!.desc: Adds another bucket at the Well! I guess 5 wasn't enough for a go getter like yourself!

7rth Barckot?!.name: 7rth Barckot?!
7rth Barckot?!.desc: Adds another bucket at the Well! You DO want more buckets, right?

Last Bucket!.name: Last Bucket!
Last Bucket!.desc: Adds another bucket at the Well! And it's the last one too, I hope your bucket lust is satiated!

9th Bucket!.name: 9th Bucket!
9th Bucket!.desc: Adds another bucket at the Well! Yea apparently there were a few more of these left!

Bucket Finale!.name: Bucket Finale!
Bucket Finale!.desc: Adds another bucket at the Well! And yea this one is actually the last one, I don't think an 11th would fit on screen!

Bar Expand-o-rama.name: Bar Expand-o-rama
Bar Expand-o-rama.desc: Adds the 'Expand Full Bars' toggle to the Well! Let me explain... when a bar is full of sediment, you lose half of the sediment, but permanently increase the max by 1.50x!

UBER Bar Expand-o-rama-hala.name: UBER Bar Expand-o-rama-hala
UBER Bar Expand-o-rama-hala.desc: Allow for UBER Full Bar Expansion, which means you can expand Well Bars beyond the previous limit of 14 times.

Expander Extravaganza.name: Expander Extravaganza
Expander Extravaganza.desc: Gives all your buckets +20% Fill Rate per bar expansion across all sediment types! This includes Uber expansions later! @ Total Bonus: +{%

Motherlode ~ Bucket Synergy.name: Motherlode ~ Bucket Synergy
Motherlode ~ Bucket Synergy.desc: Gives all your buckets 1.10x fill rate per Motherlode Layer you've destroyed! @ Total Bonus: {x

Green Amplifier.name: Green Amplifier
Green Amplifier.desc: Adds a new Amplifier stone to interact with at the Dawg Den!

Pink Amplifier.name: Pink Amplifier
Pink Amplifier.desc: Adds a new Amplifier stone to interact with at the Dawg Den!

Yellow Amplifier.name: Yellow Amplifier
Yellow Amplifier.desc: Adds a new Amplifier stone to interact with at the Dawg Den!

Cyan Amplifier.name: Cyan Amplifier
Cyan Amplifier.desc: Adds a new Amplifier stone to interact with at the Dawg Den!

Purple Amplifier.name: Purple Amplifier
Purple Amplifier.desc: Adds a new Amplifier stone to interact with at the Dawg Den!

White Amplifier.name: White Amplifier
White Amplifier.desc: Adds a new Amplifier stone to interact with at the Dawg Den!

Dark Amplifier.name: Dark Amplifier
Dark Amplifier.desc: Adds a new Amplifier stone to interact with at the Dawg Den!

Amplifier Stackin'.name: Amplifier Stackin'
Amplifier Stackin'.desc: You now get an additional +0.50x Multiplier at the Dawg Den for every 10 total charge across all amplifiers!

The Story Changes Over Time....name: The Story Changes Over Time...
The Story Changes Over Time....desc: Bravery Swords get +1 minimum DMG and +10 maximum DMG per 6 HR of AFK time at the Bravery Monument!

First Try, I swear!.name: First Try, I swear!
First Try, I swear!.desc: If you throw the LAST bravery sword first, and it kills the monster, you get a +10% Sword Max DMG bonus for the rest of the story. If it doesn't kill, this bonus resets back to 0%

Even Better Buckets.name: Even Better Buckets
Even Better Buckets.desc: Increases the base fill rate of all Well Buckets from 15/hr to 20/hr. Try changing your bucket to remove the rocks, once you remove that layer you can collect gold dust!

Eee String.name: Eee String
Eee String.desc: Permanently unlocks a new String Type for the Harp! You can level it up by plucking it, getting +1 EXP per 100% Harp Power!

Eff String.name: Eff String
Eff String.desc: Permanently unlocks a new String Type for the Harp! You can level it up by plucking it, getting +1 EXP per 100% Harp Power!

Geez String.name: Geez String
Geez String.desc: Permanently unlocks a new String Type for the Harp! You can level it up just like any other string, getting +1 EXP per 100% Harp Power!

Aye String.name: Aye String
Aye String.desc: Permanently unlocks a new String Type for the Harp! You can level it up just like any other string!

Bee String.name: Bee String
Bee String.desc: Permanently unlocks a new String Type for the Harp! You can level it up just like any other string!

Loaded Harp.name: Loaded Harp
Loaded Harp.desc: Adds +1 more string to the Harp, ready to be strummed until the end of (the) time (signature)!

Packed Harp.name: Packed Harp
Packed Harp.desc: Adds +1 more string to the Harp, you'll find it right next to all your other strings!

Hefty Harp.name: Hefty Harp
Hefty Harp.desc: Adds +1 more string to the Harp, it even makes sound when strummed! The other ones do too, but like, this one does too! Just incase you were worried it wouldn't.

Multitudinal Harp.name: Multitudinal Harp
Multitudinal Harp.desc: Adds +9999 more strings to the Harp! Haha nah just +1 string, figured I'd keep you on your toes! If I tricked you, you must go pluck the F string.

Sumptuous Harp.name: Sumptuous Harp
Sumptuous Harp.desc: Adds +1 more string to the Harp... all these strings really remind me of string cheese, I used to love it!

Domino Effect.name: Domino Effect
Domino Effect.desc: Strings give +20% more per string plucked during a strum... let me explain. Imagine you have 5 strings, this would mean the final string you pluck would be worth DOUBLE!

Variety Effect.name: Variety Effect
Variety Effect.desc: Strings give +30% more for each unique string type on your harp... I see you currently have $ different strings on your harp, so your strings are all worth #% more!

Stringy Effect.name: Stringy Effect
Stringy Effect.desc: Strings give +15% more. @ More what, you ask? More everything! They give more String EXP, more notes, higher chance for opal... so yea, MORE!

Reroll Keeper.name: Reroll Keeper
Reroll Keeper.desc: Each unused reroll you have in a Bravery Story gives +10% Sword Max DMG. So don't be all loosey goosey with those rerolls!

Fractalfly ~ Harp Synergy.name: Fractalfly ~ Harp Synergy
Fractalfly ~ Harp Synergy.desc: Boosts your Harp Note production by 1.10x per Undying Hive Layer you've destroyed! @ Total Bonus: {x

Double Dinger Ringer.name: Double Dinger Ringer
Double Dinger Ringer.desc: Ringing the Bell now has a +30% chance of giving +2 LV to a bonus, instead of just +1 LV

RNG Oxidizing Layer.name: RNG Oxidizing Layer
RNG Oxidizing Layer.desc: When you Clean the Bell and FAIL to get a new Improvement Method, the success chance for next time goes up by 1.25x. This happens every fail, and resets when you finally succeed!

Gloomie Mulch.name: Gloomie Mulch
Gloomie Mulch.desc: Gloomie mushrooms respawn +10% faster! In fact, ALL monsters across all the worlds of IdleOn respawn +10% faster!

Improvement Stackin'.name: Improvement Stackin'
Improvement Stackin'.desc: For every 25 LVs across all Improvement Methods upgrades at the Bell, all your Improvement Method bonuses are 1.10x higher! @ Total bonus: }x

Gloomie Lootie.name: Gloomie Lootie
Gloomie Lootie.desc: +5% Drop Rate for each Colony of Gloomie Mushrooms defeated! Drop rate here as in like, the one for stuff outside of the Caverns. @ Total Bonus: +{%

Gloomie Expie.name: Gloomie Expie
Gloomie Expie.desc: +25% Class EXP gain for each Colony of Gloomie Mushrooms defeated! @ Total Bonus: +{%

Gloomie Opie.name: Gloomie Opie
Gloomie Opie.desc: +10% Villager EXP gain for each Colony of Gloomie Mushrooms successfully romanced... or defeated, whichever is higher. @ Total Bonus: +{%

Motherlode Trickledown.name: Motherlode Trickledown
Motherlode Trickledown.desc: +15% All Skill Efficiency, and +10% All Skill EXP gain per Motherlode Layer you've destroyed!

Fractalfly Trickledown.name: Fractalfly Trickledown
Fractalfly Trickledown.desc: +15% All Skill Efficiency, and +10% All Skill EXP gain per Undying Hive Layer you've destroyed!

Rift Guy.name: Rift Guy
Rift Guy.desc: Hey bet you weren't expecting to see me here, huh? Well, that's just how it goes with me, it's in my blood. It's how I roll. Go ahead, create me. Or don't, I'll keep being me.

DNA Rock Tumbler.name: DNA Rock Tumbler
DNA Rock Tumbler.desc: Gives you a +60% chance to get an additional Grey Gene when trashing a pet for every Power of 10 Gravel you have. @ Total Bonus: +{% Chance for extra Gene

Final Ballad of the Snail.name: Final Ballad of the Snail
Final Ballad of the Snail.desc: Gives you a 1.04x higher success chance when leveling up Snail for every Power of 10 Trebel Notes you have. @ Total Bonus: {x Snail success chance

Noise Reduction Therapy.name: Noise Reduction Therapy
Noise Reduction Therapy.desc: Gives you a multiplicative 1.20x Stealth bonus for all ninjas for every Power of 10 Quaver Notes you have. @ Total Bonus: {x Stealth

Tune of Artifaction.name: Tune of Artifaction
Tune of Artifaction.desc: Gives you +10% Artifact Find Chance for every Power of 10 Natural Notes you have. @ Total Bonus: +{% Artifact Find Chance

Heavy Redstone Seasoning.name: Heavy Redstone Seasoning
Heavy Redstone Seasoning.desc: Gives you a multiplicative 1.30x Cooking Speed bonus for every Power of 10 Redstone you have. @ Total Bonus: {x Cooking Speed

True Golden Edge.name: True Golden Edge
True Golden Edge.desc: Gives all your players +20% Damage for every Power of 10 Golddust you have. @ Total Bonus: +{% Damage

Loadin' some 'Lode.name: Loadin' some 'Lode
Loadin' some 'Lode.desc: Gives +5 Bucket Fill Rate per Power of 10 Motherlode Ore mined. You have mined # so far! @ Total Bonus: +{/hr Bucket Fill Rate

Hiring the Hounds from Beyond.name: Hiring the Hounds from Beyond
Hiring the Hounds from Beyond.desc: Gives +10 B.F.R. per 100 hounds defeated in best runs of each class. 尬  Beginner:!, Warrior:#, Archer:$, Mage:% @ Total Bonus: +{/hr Bucket Fill Rate

Triple Tap Tinkle.name: Triple Tap Tinkle
Triple Tap Tinkle.desc: Ringing the Bell now has another +30% chance of giving +2 LV to a bonus instead of just +1 LV. Also, there's a new +20% chance of giving +3 LV instead of +2 or +1!

Compound Interest.name: Compound Interest
Compound Interest.desc: You start with +1 more Court Coins every Power of 2 HRs of AFK time at the Justice Monument! So 2Hrs you get +1 coin, 4Hrs you get +2 coins, 8Hrs you get +3 coins, and so on!
